mapper.sql: sid,sale_no, bills_no, shoppe_pro_sid, lock_sum, lock_type_sid, lock_time, note
mapper.select: select count(*) from pcm_stock_lock_record where bills_no = #{billsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and shoppe_pro_sid = #{shoppeProSid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select lock_sum from pcm_stock_lock_record where bills_no = #{billsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and shoppe_pro_sid = #{shoppeProSid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into pcm_stock_lock_record
sid,
sale_no,
bills_no,
shoppe_pro_sid,
lock_sum,
lock_type_sid,
lock_time,
note,
#{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT},

mapper.update:
update pcm_stock_lock_record
sale_no = #{saleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bills_no = #{billsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shoppe_pro_sid = #{shoppeProSid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
lock_sum = #{lockSum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
lock_type_sid = #{lockTypeSid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
lock_time = #{lockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT sale_no,bills_no,COUNT(bills_no) as rowNum from pcm_stock_lock_record where sale_no= #{saleNo} GROUP BY sale_no,bills_no HAVING COUNT(bills_no)=2
